name: unescape-backticks-from-clipboard
title: Unescape Backticks From Clipboard
description: Effortlessly remove escape characters from backticks in your clipboard content. This extension scans your clipboard for any escaped backticks (‚Å†\``) and replaces them with actual backticks (``  ``), ensuring your text is clean and ready for use in code, documentation, or any other context where unescaped backticks are needed.
author: nathan_vale

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
